Name: ELE BLAZE
About the game: Fighting, dodge bullets and traps, ELE BLAZE is transverse scrolling game of ACT, The girl - Nono have powerful ELE energy battling with enemies and stop chaos spreads, save the universe. features adorable animations of charater Melee combo, agile bullets, and Healing skill to fight with enemyies powerful rush skill dodge attacks and traps from enemy The strong BOSS in deep stage waitting for battle with you convenient select stage to beginning your game default keyboard setting: Jump W Crouch S Jump - W Crouch - S Left - A Right - D Fight - J shot - K Rush - L heal - I Press F1 reset button to default on setting stage
